name: The Mexorcist
description:
The Mexorcist receives a call from a man claiming to have a demon in his home named El Demonio. The Mexorcist decides it is his duty to rid the demon and any other entities within the home. 

You play as The Mexorcist, a man who rids the world of the demonic using his trusty demon hunting gear: A cross... and Valentina Hot Sauce!

This game is fully intended to be a joke and to be seen by Youtuber EddieVR/SpecialEdd. Of course, others can play this if they so choose! The game is also not complete, although, I am unsure if I'll continue working on it. The feedback I receive will fully determine whether I will make more of the game. If any problems occur, please let me know immediately so I can try fixing it.
